item.title: The Bishops Are Right to Sue the Federal Government over Refugee Resettlement
item.description: Whatever the outcome of the case, the Catholic Church’s mission to assist legally admitted refugees is clear and convincing.

item.title: Trump Should Take a Bite out of Nonsensical Laws
item.description: An insane number of things are classified as federal crimes, and that doesn’t even include the labyrinth of federal rules Americans are subject to.

item.title: A Modest Republican Budget Plan
item.description: Far from being draconian, the House-passed budget resolution would cut spending by a relatively small amount.
